I've now scored 40 points on the highest stage you can ever score, said Linas Kleiza , whose previous career-high of 29 came March 15 against the Los Angeles Lakers. Page, now 37 and graying. While Eric Schmidt travels the world meeting with business partners, government officials and potential takeover targets, Page says he will be making most of the big decisions as he tries to rekindle the soul and passion of a start-up. Sergey Brin will concentrate on developing new products. He's worth$ 15 billion, but Page remains something of a rebel who has always had a disdain for corporate protocol.
